title: Solve (2) for $$x$$, and plug $$x$$ into (3) and solve for $$y$$. Then, plug $$x$$ and $$y$$ into (1) and solve for $$y$$ again.
Using both $$y$$ values, set them equal to each other and solve for $$z$$. Then plug $$z$$ into either of the y-values. Finally, using both $$z$$ and $$y$$, plug into $$x$$ and solve.
